description: The CAP_PAY_RIDERS table contains riders associated with capitation detailed transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DIST_RIDER_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The riders associated with the transaction.

columns.name: DIST_RIDER_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.
